mapper.select: select a.store_id as storeId , a.item_id as itemId , a.item_qty as itemQty , b.upc as upc , b.item_kr_nm as itemKrNm , b.item_en_nm as itemEnNm , b.regular_price as regularPrice , b.category_cd as categoryCd , b.item_tax_cd as itemTaxCd , b.item_deposit_cd as itemDepositCd , b.item_eco_cd as itemEcoCd , b.item_size as itemSize , b.sale_unit as saleUnit , b.promotion_bundle_qty as promotionBundleQty , b.promotion_start_date as promotionStartDate , b.promotion_end_date as promotionEndDate , b.promotion_price as promotionPrice , (case when getdate() > b.promotion_start_date and b.promotion_end_date > getdate() and b.promotion_bundle_qty = 1 then b.promotion_price else b.regular_price end) as salesPrice , (case when getdate() > b.promotion_start_date and b.promotion_end_date > getdate() and b.promotion_bundle_qty = 1 then ceiling(((b.regular_price - b.promotion_price)/b.regular_price)*100) else 0 end) as discountRate , isnull(d.cmn_file_url,'proct-photos/np_image_available.jpg') as imgUrl , a.reg_date as regDate , a.reg_person as regPerson , a.last_mod_date as lastModDate , a.last_mod_person as lastModPerson from cart a inner join item b on b.item_id = a.item_id and b.store_id = a.store_id and is_use = 1 left join item_file c on c.store_id = b.store_id and c.item_id = b.item_id and c.seq = 1 left join cmn_file d on d.cmn_file_id = c.cmn_file_id where a.account_no = #{accountNo} and a.store_id = #{storeId} order by a.item_id offset #{startRownum} rows fetch next #{listSize} row only

select sum(m.item_qty) as totalQty , convert(numeric(10,2), sum(m.totalSalesPrice)) as totalSalesPrice , convert(numeric(10,2), sum(m.gstFee)) as totalGstFee , convert(numeric(10,2), sum(m.pstFee)) as totalPstFee , convert(numeric(10,2), sum(m.ecoFee)) as totalEcoFee , convert(numeric(10,2), sum(m.depositFee)) as totalDepositFee , convert(numeric(10,2), sum(m.totalSalesPrice)+sum(m.gstFee)+sum(m.pstFee)+sum(m.ecoFee)+sum(m.depositFee)) as grandTotalPrice from ( select item_qty , (case when getdate() > b.promotion_start_date and b.promotion_end_date > getdate() and b.promotion_bundle_qty = 1 then b.promotion_price * item_qty else b.regular_price * item_qty end) as totalSalesPrice , (case when 'G' = b.item_tax_cd then b.regular_price * 0.05 when 'B' = b.item_tax_cd then b.regular_price * 0.05 else 0 end) as gstFee , (case when 'B' = b.item_tax_cd then b.regular_price * 0.07 else 0 end) as pstFee , isnull((case when b.item_eco_cd is null then 0 else (select EcoFee from mfProdEco where ReturnType = b.item_eco_cd) end),0) as ecoFee , isnull((case when b.item_deposit_cd is null then 0 else (select TotalFee from tblEncorp where ReturnType = b.item_deposit_cd) end),0) as depositFee from cart a inner join item b on b.item_id = a.item_id and b.store_id = a.store_id and is_use = 1 where a.account_no = #{accountNo} and a.store_id = #{storeId} union select 0 as item_qty , 0 as totalSalesPrice , 0 as gstFee , 0 as pstFee , 0 as ecoFee , 0 as depositFee ) m

select a.store_id as storeId , a.item_id as itemId , a.item_qty as itemQty , b.upc as upc , b.item_kr_nm as itemKrNm , b.item_en_nm as itemEnNm , b.regular_price as regularPrice , b.category_cd as categoryCd , b.item_tax_cd as itemTaxCd , b.item_deposit_cd as itemDepositCd , b.item_eco_cd as itemEcoCd , b.item_size as itemSize , b.sale_unit as saleUnit , b.promotion_bundle_qty as promotionBundleQty , b.promotion_start_date as promotionStartDate , b.promotion_end_date as promotionEndDate , b.promotion_price as promotionPrice , 'http://placehold.it/121x114' as imgUrl , a.reg_date as regDate , a.reg_person as regPerson , a.last_mod_date as lastModDate , a.last_mod_person as lastModPerson from cart a inner join item b on b.item_id = a.item_id and b.store_id = a.store_id and is_use = 1 where a.account_no = #{accountNo} and a.store_id = #{storeId} and a.item_id = #{itemId}
mapper.insert: merge cart as a using (select #{accountNo} as account_no , #{storeId} as store_id , #{itemId} as item_id , #{itemQty} as item_qty , getdate() as reg_date , #{regPerson} as reg_person , getdate() as last_mod_date , #{lastModPerson} as last_mod_person ) as b on ( a.account_no = b.account_no and a.store_id = b.store_id and a.item_id = b.item_id) when not matched then insert ( account_no , store_id , item_id , item_qty , reg_date , reg_person , last_mod_date , last_mod_person ) values ( b.account_no , b.store_id , b.item_id , b.item_qty , b.reg_date , b.reg_person , b.last_mod_date , b.last_mod_person ) when matched then update set a.last_mod_person = b.last_mod_person , a.last_mod_date = b.last_mod_date , a.item_qty += b.item_qty;
